Title of Research: Investigation of One Dimensional Ultrasounds Sensitivity as a Monitoring Method of Minimally Invasive Thermal Therapy
Objective: 1) To study and identify the possible A-Mode ultrasound parameters that is sensitive to changes in temperature and tissue structure for real time monitoring of MITT. 2) To investigate the sensitivity of A-Mode ultrasound as a monitoring method of MITT by determining the correlation between the ultrasound parameters and progression of tissue death to thermal intensity given by water bath heating method/HIFU during the therapy procedure. 3) To make recommendation on the use of A-Mode ultrasound as an accurate and faster monitoring method of MITT compared to the other complex imaging modalities.

Title of Research: Machine learning Model of Readmission among Recovered Covid-19 Patients: For a Longer Fight after Movement Control Order in Malaysia using ICT technologies
Objective: Build a a Covid-19 readmission prediction model to predict patients at a high risk of reinfection.
